column4: I can run x-interfacing commands (like xdotool) directly from the GNOME console or via VNC, but when I try to run it remotely, I get "Error: Can't open display: :1"  How to fix this?
Try prefixing the command with DISPLAY=:0
for :0 and :1 I get "No protocol specified" in addition to the other errors
but for :2 I just get the other errors
